channel.title: Noob Question: Why do the Unseen spawn so much more often than the Cult?
channel.description: Title about sums it up. In the games I play, something like 80-90% of them will have the Unseen rather than the Cult, which I think is kind of a downer since the Cult are so much more interesting lore-wise. My friend had told me that the Cult won't spawn if any of the players in the game are new, but I know that this isn't the case because I wound up being Cult Leader on my very first game (I had no idea what I was doing, the King picked me at random to investigate on Night 1, and I got executed on Day 2).

item.title: Noob Question: Why do the Unseen spawn so much more often than the Cult?
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
I was always told that it was all at launch time , but it may hav changed then I guess .

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Question: Why do the Unseen spawn so much more often than the Cult?
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
newarkinvaders:

if nyone in the game is new you wont get a cult match

Typical_Name:

I wound up being Cult Leader on my very first game

Contradictory

I believe 75% or so of the players in the game must be experienced (I don’t know how many games) for cult to spawn

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Question: Why do the Unseen spawn so much more often than the Cult?
item.dc:creator: newarkinvaders
item.description:
If you haven’t played an amount of matchs you wont get a cult game , if nyone in the game is new you wont get a cult match . so more often than not someone is new so it spawns unseen

item.source: Noob Question: Why do the Unseen spawn so much more often than the Cult?

item.title: Noob Question: Why do the Unseen spawn so much more often than the Cult?
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Cult only shows up when there is more than 11 people.

And new player won’t be meeting cult, too.

Read full topic

Title about sums it up. In the games I play, something like 80-90% of them will have the Unseen rather than the Cult, which I think is kind of a downer since the Cult are so much more interesting lore-wise. My friend had told me that the Cult won’t spawn if any of the players in the game are new, but I know that this isn’t the case because I wound up being Cult Leader on my very first game (I had no idea what I was doing, the King picked me at random to investigate on Night 1, and I got executed on Day 2).
